TimeConverter Class Reference

TimeConverter has all the time conversion and snapping functionality that used to live in TimeTextCtrl. The idea is to have a GUI-less class which can do the conversions, so that we can use it in sanpping without having a window created each time. More...

Detailed Description

TimeConverter has all the time conversion and snapping functionality that used to live in TimeTextCtrl. The idea is to have a GUI-less class which can do the conversions, so that we can use it in sanpping without having a window created each time.
